00112 
00114 #if defined(LETIMER_CTRL_RTCC0TEN)
00115 #define LETIMER_INIT_DEFAULT                                                  \
00116 {                                                                             \
00117   true,               /* Enable timer when init complete. */                  \
00118   false,              /* Stop counter during debug halt. */                   \
00119   false,              /* Do not start counting on RTC COMP0 match. */         \
00120   false,              /* Do not start counting on RTC COMP1 match. */         \
00121   false,              /* Do not load COMP0 into CNT on underflow. */          \
00122   false,              /* Do not load COMP1 into COMP0 when REP0 reaches 0. */ \
00123   0,                  /* Idle value 0 for output 0. */                        \
00124   0,                  /* Idle value 0 for output 1. */                        \
00125   letimerUFOANone,    /* No action on underflow on output 0. */               \
00126   letimerUFOANone,    /* No action on underflow on output 1. */               \
00127   letimerRepeatFree   /* Count until stopped by SW. */                        \
00128 }
00129 #else
00130 #define LETIMER_INIT_DEFAULT                                                  \
00131 {                                                                             \
00132   true,               /* Enable timer when init complete. */                  \
00133   false,              /* Stop counter during debug halt. */                   \
00134   false,              /* Do not load COMP0 into CNT on underflow. */          \
00135   false,              /* Do not load COMP1 into COMP0 when REP0 reaches 0. */ \
00136   0,                  /* Idle value 0 for output 0. */                        \
00137   0,                  /* Idle value 0 for output 1. */                        \
00138   letimerUFOANone,    /* No action on underflow on output 0. */               \
00139   letimerUFOANone,    /* No action on underflow on output 1. */               \
00140   letimerRepeatFree   /* Count until stopped by SW. */                        \
00141 }
00142 #endif
